H0.text: The leaves provide shelter to growing seeds is the statement the student will most likely give to explain the importance of dead leaves in the ecosystem.

H1.text: The decay of the leaves provides nutrients to other plants, which is the statement the student will most likely give to explain the importance of dead leaves in the ecosystem.

H2.text: The leaves release chlorophyll into the grass as they decay is the statement the student will most likely provide to explain the importance of dead leaves in the ecosystem.

H3.text: The leaves prevent fungus from growing at the base of the tree, a statement a student would most likely use to explain the importance of dead leaves in the ecosystem.

A4.text: As litter decomposes, nutrients are released into the environment.
